allocate(bytes,address).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can      call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to allocate to the recipient

distribute(address[],bytes,address).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can      call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to distribute to the recipients

getMilestoneStatus(address,uint256).details: This is used to check the status of the milestone of an recipient and is strategy specific

returns._0: Status Returns the status of the milestone using the 'Status' enum
Milestone[] Returns the milestones for a 'recipientId'

getPayouts(address[],bytes[]).details: The encoded '_data' will be determined by the strategy implementation.

params._data: The data to use to get the payout summary for the recipients

returns._0: The payout summary for the recipients

increasePoolAmount(uint256).details: Increases the 'poolAmount' by '_amount'. Only 'Allo' contract can call this.

params._amount: The amount to increase the pool by

returns._0: 'true' if the pool is active, otherwise 'false'

isValidAllocator(address).details: How the allocator is determined is up to the strategy implementation.

params._allocator: The address to check if it is a valid allocator for the strategy.

returns._0: 'true' if the address is a valid allocator, 'false' otherwise

registerRecipient(bytes,address).details: Registers a recipient and returns the ID of the recipient. The encoded '_data' will be determined by the      strategy implementation. Only 'Allo' contract can call this when it is initialized.

params._data: The data to use to register the recipient

rejectMilestone(address,uint256).details: 'msg.sender' must be a pool manager to reject a milestone. Emits a 'MilestonesStatusChanged()' event.

params._status: The status of the milestone review

setMilestones(address,(uint256,(uint256,.details: 'msg.sender' must be recipient creator or pool manager. Emits a 'MilestonesReviewed()' event.

setPoolActive(bool).details: 'msg.sender' must be a pool manager to close the pool. Emits a 'PoolActive()' event.

params._flag: The flag to set the pool to active or inactive

submitMilestone(address,uint256,(uint256.details: 'msg.sender' must be the 'recipientId' (this depends on whether your using registry gating) and must be a member      of a 'Profile' to sumbit a milestone and '_recipientId'.      must NOT be the same as 'msg.sender'. Emits a 'MilestonesSubmitted()' event.

withdraw(uint256).details: 'msg.sender' must be a pool manager to withdraw funds.

allocatedGrantAmount().notice: The total amount allocated to grant/recipient.

constructor.notice: Constructor for the Direct Grants Simple Strategy

getMilestoneStatus(address,uint256).notice: Get the status of the milestone of an recipient.

getPayouts(address[],bytes[]).notice: Gets the payout summary for recipients.

getRecipientStatus(address).notice: Getter for the status of a recipient.

grantAmountRequired().notice: Flag to check if grant amount is required.

isPoolActive().notice: Getter for whether or not the pool is active.

isValidAllocator(address).notice: Checks if the '_allocator' is a valid allocator.

metadataRequired().notice: Flag to check if metadata is required.

milestones(address,uint256).notice: This maps accepted recipients to their milestones

registryGating().notice: Flag to check if registry gating is enabled.

rejectMilestone(address,uint256).notice: Reject pending milestone of the recipient.

setPoolActive(bool).notice: Toggle the status between active and inactive.

setRecipientStatusToInReview(address[]).notice: Set the status of the recipient to 'InReview'

upcomingMilestone(address).notice: This maps accepted recipients to their upcoming milestone

@notice Throws when the allocation exceeds the pool amount.

@notice Emitted for the submission of a milestone.
@notice Emitted for the status change of a milestone.
@notice Emitted for the milestones set.
@notice Flag to check if registry gating is enabled.
@notice Flag to check if metadata is required.
